LanguageData.OE_Cook_JumylinePack.label: cook jumyline candies x5
LanguageData.OE_Cook_JumylinePack.description: Cook 5 jumyline candies from jumy berries and chocolate.
LanguageData.OE_Cook_JumylineBulk.label: cook jumyline candies x10
LanguageData.OE_Cook_JumylineBulk.description: Cook 10 jumyline candies from jumy berries and chocolate.
LanguageData.OE_CookCanMeal.label: cook obsidia can meal
LanguageData.OE_CookCanMeal.description: Cook an exquisite, high-quality meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Jumy berries are delicately used as a spice to enhance the flavors. While much of the ingredients are meticulously trimmed away, this process ensures the creation of an unparalleled dining experience.

Jumy berries are delicately used as a spice to enhance the flavors. While much of the ingredients are meticulously trimmed away, this process ensures the creation of an unparalleled dining experience.
